summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3732 for the improvement of West Connecticut Street, from Railroad Avenue to the inner harbor line; by paving and filling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45800, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
